name: FanaticBlader
description: An easy and fast 3D Side-Scroll action game, "Fanatic Blader" Challenge the "Cursed Tower" that any wish will come true!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows10 Processor: i3-2100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX-650ti Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows10 Processor: i3-4160 Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: GTX-650ti Storage: 2 MB available space
